{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$237.3M in 2020-2021 on contracts with FTI PROFESSIONAL GRADE.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [FTI PROFESSIONAL GRADE INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22FTI%20PROFESSIONAL%20GRADE%20%20INC.%22)
{{< /details >}}
